subject: Re: [junit] Swing TestRunner - rerun single test under VAJ
msgSnippet: ... I have already reported something similar to this to JUnit on Sourceforge. J. B. Rainsberger President, Diaspar Software Services
messageBody:
>From: "Cox, Randy" <randy.cox@...>
>
>I am using the junit.swingui.TestRunner under VAJava and have experienced
>the following behavior.
>
>I run my suite of tests and get a red bar - a test fails. I then change
>some code in either the test case or the class under test and select the
>failing test and press the run button to rerun just that test. The test
>reruns, but the results text boxes on the GUI are not updated. If I run
>all tests the results boxes are cleared and updated.

I have already reported something similar to this to JUnit on Sourceforge.

J. B. Rainsberger
President, Diaspar Software Services
http://www.diasparsoftware.com
